Elder Call - How to Delete Your Data

At ElderCall, we value your privacy and offer you a simple way to delete your data. Follow the instructions below to remove your data permanently from our app.

Step-by-Step Guide

Once you log in to your account and land on the homepage, follow these steps:

  1. Look for the red delete icon located at the top right corner of the homepage.
  2. Click the delete icon.
  3. A prompt will appear asking, "Do you want to delete your data?"
  4. Choose Yes to confirm the deletion. If you select No, the process will be canceled.
  5. Once confirmed, the deletion process will begin, and all your account data and associated information will be permanently deleted.

Data Retention Policy

Please note that once your data is deleted, it cannot be recovered. You will need to create a new account if you wish to use the app again in the future.
